text: Anita Jo is a 1919 German silent crime film directed by Dimitri Buchowetzki and starring Bernhard Goetzke, Charles Willy Kayser, and Hanni Weisse. ==Cast== ==References== ==Bibliography== * ==External links== * Category:1919 films Category:1919 crime films Category:German crime films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:German silent feature films Category:Films directed by Dimitri Buchowetzki Category:German black- and-white films
title: Anita Jo
